type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.repositories.PasswordCredentials
type.description: A username/password credentials that can be used to login to password-protected remote repository.

method.name: getPassword
method.description:
Returns the password to use when authenticating to this repository.

returns:The password. May be null.

method.name: getUsername
method.description:
Returns the user name to use when authenticating to this repository.

returns:The user name. May be null.

method.name: setPassword
method.description:
Sets the password to use when authenticating to this repository.
param:password The password. May be null.

method.name: setUsername
method.description:
Sets the user name to use when authenticating to this repository.
param:userName The user name. May be null.

property.name: password
property.description:
Returns the password to use when authenticating to this repository.

returns:The password. May be null.

property.name: username
property.description:
Returns the user name to use when authenticating to this repository.

returns:The user name. May be null.
